assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Mochida Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pharmaceuticals, skincare products, and biomaterial solutions in Japan. The company's therapeutic areas include cardiovascular medicine for the treatment of lifestyle diseases, such as hyperlipidemia, hypertension, and hyperuricemia; obstetrics and gynecology, including treatments for the endometriosis and dysmenorrhea, and pregnancy test kits; psychiatry, which comprises antidepressants; and gastroenterology that covers treatments for ulcerative colitis and chronic constipation; and skin care, baby care, personal care, and nursing products. It also developing drugs for the treatment of intractable diseases; and dMD-001, a medical device that is used for the treatment of articular cartilage lesions, as well as dMD-002, which is used for the treatment of cavernous nerve injury. Mochida Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
